name: Cleopatra Green Sapphire Ring
description:
The Cleopatra Ring is a powerful embodiment of feminine strength, radiating regal allure through its captivating Egyptian-inspired design. The central green sapphire commands attention, capturing the very essence of royalty, while the shank of the ring features a unique handmade pattern, underscoring its distinctive character. A testament to timeless elegance and the commanding presence associated with the iconic queen, this ring stands as a symbol of grace, power, and the enduring beauty that defines Cleopatra's remarkable legacy.
- 18K yellow gold
- Green sapphire
- Diamonds

name: Cleopatra Pink Sapphire Ring
description:
The Cleopatra Ring is a striking manifestation of feminine strength, radiating regal allure through its captivating Egyptian-inspired design. The central pink sapphire commands attention, capturing the very essence of royalty, while the shank, adorned with diamonds and polished to a mirror-like finish, adds an extra layer of opulence. This ring stands as a powerful symbol of grace, strength, and enduring beauty—a testament to the timeless elegance associated with the iconic queen, Cleopatra.

- 18K yellow gold
- Pink sapphire
- Diamonds

name: Cleopatra Tanzanite Ring
description:
The Cleopatra Ring is a powerful statement piece crafted to epitomize feminine strength, exuding regal allure in an Egyptian-inspired design. The central vivid blue tanzanite commands attention, capturing the essence of royalty, while a shank adorned with sparkling white diamonds features a unique handmade pattern. This ring testifies to the timeless elegance and commanding presence associated with the queen herself—a symbol of grace, power, and the enduring beauty of Cleopatra's legacy.

- 18K yellow gold
- Tanzanite
- Diamonds

name: Ambition Ring
description:
The Ambition Ring showcases a captivating pear-shaped yellow diamond, embraced by sleek black enamel that ambitiously connects two elegantly crafted halos. 
This ring is a masterpiece of contrasting elements, blending brilliant, vibrant color with sophisticated monochrome accents.
- 18K yellow gold 
- Pear-shaped yellow diamond
- White diamonds

name: Cleopatra Sapphire Earrings
description:
The design, with its graceful curves and intricate details, echoes the opulence of Cleopatra's era, a time when beauty was a language spoken through adornment. The airy and light construction adds a modern touch, allowing these earrings to seamlessly transition from day to night.

- 18K yellow gold
- Yellow and purple sapphires
- Diamonds

name: Ra Red Spinel Earrings
description:
Feel the radiant energy of the sun god Ra with these captivating hoop earrings, adorned with fiery red mahenge spinels.The hoop design, symbolizing the eternal cycle of life, mirrors the celestial orbits that were central to ancient Egyptian beliefs. The red spinel, reminiscent of the sun's heated embrace, adds a bold touch of passion.

- 18K yellow gold
- Mahenge red spinel

name: Selene Tourmaline Earrings
description:
The Selene Earrings are adorned with multicolored oval tourmalines and delicately encircled by a halo of light pink sapphires, bringing soft femininity and sophistication to the design. The earrings’ dynamic movement creates a subtle dance of light, enhancing their allure. A captivating fusion of bespoke craftsmanship and ethereal elegance. 

- 18K yellow gold 
- Light pink calibrated sapphires
- Multicolored tourmaline cabochons

name: Love Chakra Ruby Bracelet
description:
In this exquisite bracelet, two meaningful essentials converge: the heart chakra symbol and a resplendent natural red ruby, the gemstone of love. The heart chakra symbol radiates positive energy, while the ruby infuses passion and elegance. This bracelet invites the energies of love to manifest in every facet of life. Envision it as a heartfelt talisman symbolizing love's enduring presence and transformative power, gracefully accompanying you on your life's journey.

- 18K yellow gold
-Unheated  Ruby
- Diamonds

description:

Inspired by the Arabic term urging action, this bracelet is a vibrant call to embrace positive change and take decisive steps forward.
